text: 1. Easy Everyday is HERE! I can’t believe that it’s finally out in the world. Promise I’m close to done yapping about it! 2. How the masters entered it’s content creator era. Um hello I want to go. 3. Do you think in 15 or 20 years we will think of sol de janiero scents like we did of sunflowers, CK one and so on? Totally. 4. Reclaiming your own attention. One way I do this is a brain dump to-do list at night right before bed! 5. TV things!! Oh my gosh – the new show on Apple TV, Your Friends and Neighbors is SO GOOD. 6. The s’moyster. I don’t know what I think about this. 7. Easter is my least-favorite food holiday. What’s on your menu? 8. I think I’m growing snacking peppers this year.
html:
1. Easy Everyday is HERE! I can’t believe that it’s finally out in the world. Promise I’m close to done yapping about it!

2. How the masters entered it’s content creator era. Um hello I want to go.

3. Do you think in 15 or 20 years we will think of sol de janiero scents like we did of sunflowers, CK one and so on? Totally.

4. Reclaiming your own attention. One way I do this is a brain dump to-do list at night right before bed!

5. TV things!! Oh my gosh – the new show on Apple TV, Your Friends and Neighbors is SO GOOD.

6. The s’moyster. I don’t know what I think about this.

7. Easter is my least-favorite food holiday. What’s on your menu?

8. I think I’m growing snacking peppers this year.
